meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Hugh Zegers Jeff Rinde Bruce Borchardt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2444.

td.p: Hugh Zegers, a high school teacher originally from The Hague, Netherlands
Jeff Rinde, a teacher originally from Endwell, New York
Bruce Borchardt, a metrologist originally from Denver, Colorado (whose 3-day cash winnings total $44,899)

tr.td: THE CIVIL WAR
'50s FILM FACTS
FOOD & DRINK
BODIES OF WATER
NOTORIOUS
ENDS IN "GO"
